subject: Re: [junit] [OT] Beeping Asserts
msgSnippet: ... Since it s hyperbole, and those sales have already been tallied, I don t see the harm. Why do you people want me to keep guessing? I keep guessing wrong.
messageBody:
Simon Chappell wrote:
>
> > > I've only played with it for a couple of days but it looks pretty
> > > good so far. Don't know who uses this stuff internally within
> > > IBM but there are obviously customers of IBM who demand this stuff.
> >
> > I wouldn't draw that conclusion. I worked on WebSphere Commerce
> > 1998-2001 and we pretty much made stuff up.
>
> Are you sure you should be admitting that? :-)

Since it's hyperbole, and those sales have already been tallied, I don't
see the harm.

"Why do you people want me to keep guessing? I keep guessing wrong."
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
